the languages it knew in life

blocks.name: Regeneration
blocks.text: [name] regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If [name] takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of [name]'s next turn.

blocks.name: Spider Climb
blocks.text: [name] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

blocks.name: Vampire Weaknesses
blocks.text:
[name] has the following flaws:
  *Forbiddance.* [name] can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
  *Harmed by Running Water.* [name] takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.
  *Stake to the Heart.* [name] is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.
  *Sunlight Hypersensitivity.* [name] takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

blocks.name: Claws
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. *Hit:* dmg[2d4 + str] slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, [name] can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by [name], incapacitated, or restrained. *Hit:* dmg[1d6 + str] piercing damage plus dmg[2d6] necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and [name] regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
